attributes.action: Recommend  that Buteyko Institute Method of Breathing be freely available to all via the natioanl health service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Uk has the reputation for some of the highest incidence of asthma in the world. research demonstrates breathing retraining IE the Buteyko Institute Programme taught by registered Buteyko Institute Pactitioners (MBIBH)can reverse the condition and reduce the symptoms make this available now and stop 1600 annual deaths from asthma.Reduce the medications and improve the quality of life for all asthma sufferers.
